snippet: The prisoner, Younis al-Mauritani, suspected of being a senior member of Al Qaeda, was transferred from the American military base in Bagram to Mauritania, officials in Mauritania said.
lead_paragraph: The prisoner, Younis al-Mauritani, suspected of being a senior member of Al Qaeda, was transferred from the American military base in Bagram to Mauritania, officials in Mauritania said.

headline.main: Mauritania Says U.S. Sent Prisoner From Afghan Base
headline.print_headline: Mauritania Says U.S. Sent Prisoner From Afghan Base
